article: an israeli startup has convinced wireless carriers in three countries to try a new concept : a tiny cell phone that pops into interchangeable `` jackets '' to become a bigger , smarter phone -- or into other gadgets to connect them to the internet .
abstract: israeli startup to launch tiny phone that slips into mp# gps gadgets
